sense.name: a corridor or narrow passageway
sense.commentary: HALLWAY[+structure][+architectural][+corridor] Note: implies a connection between other areas, but is not a room itself.
sense.examples: Our hotel room was on the third floor at the end of the hallway. Mary was chatting with Bob in the hallway about the new project. Sally tripped over a slick spot while running down the hallway.

sense.name: an entrance room to a building
sense.commentary: HALLWAY[+structure][+architectural][+room][+entrance][+building] Note: implies an open area by the entrance to a building
sense.examples: The visitor stood in the hallway while the butler announced his presence. The front doors of the manor opened onto a marble entrance hallway. We left our shoes on the mat in the front hallway.
